articles.description: Princess Eugenie, 30, who is pregnant with her first child with husband Jack Brooksbank, joined her sister Princess Beatrice, 32, in praising the duchess, 61, who is based in Windsor.
articles.content: Princess Eugenie was overcome with emotion as she praised her mother Sarah, Duchess of York, for teaching 'us how to give back to people' in a video call to mark the 30th anniversary of the Teenage C… [+5623 chars]

articles.description: Liam Payne has reportedly forked out millions to ensure that his ex Cheryl and his son Bear can live in luxury in Buckinghamshire with Cheryl's mother Joan living with them too
articles.content:
Liam Payne has reportedly helped to buy the £3.7 million mansion that his ex Cheryl lives in with their three-year-old son Bear.
